text: Verkh-Potka () is a rural locality (a village) in Toykinskoye Rural Settlement, Bolshesosnovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 232 as of 2010.ВПН-2010. Численность и размещение населения Пермского края There are 8 streets. == Geography == It is located 6 km west from Toykino. == References == Category:Rural localities in Bolshesosnovsky District
title: Verkh-Potka
